SourcedStatement: HUD told me in a statement that AHF 'is part of a team that applied for these awards. The team is not only eligible, but the best qualified applicant.'
Name: HUD
Justification: U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development, federal agency responsible for housing grants

SourcedStatement: Housing policy is inherently local, and federal legislators should encourage local solutions to local problems
Name: Tim Scott
Title: Senator
Justification: Republican senator who led introduction of the Renewing Opportunity in the American Dream (ROAD) to Housing Act

SourcedStatement: More than 80% of housing properties that have received D.C. funding aren't bringing in enough rental income to pay their mortgages and maintenance costs, according to the District's Department of Housing and Community Development.
Name: District's Department of Housing and Community Development
